tool_description: This API will allow you to send and receive text and image messages
title: Message API

api_list.name: send-text
api_list.description: This endpoint will allow you to send text messages

optional_parameters.name: send-text
optional_parameters.description: This endpoint will allow users to send text messages

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://message-api4.p.rapidapi.com/send-text"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "message-api4.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: send-image

optional_parameters.name: send-image
optional_parameters.description: This endpoint will allow users to send images
